DOC.brief_summary: This study assess ability naltrexone ( Revia ) reduce risk relapse Alaska natives alcohol dependence . The study also examine whether combination naltrexone sertraline ( Zoloft ) yield good abstinence rate naltrexone use alone . Alaska Native individual recruit 16 week outpatient study .
